projects.name: Avedon
projects.subtitle: Streetwear brand system with an elevated, modern edge.
projects.problem: Develop a distinctive streetwear identity that feels bold and scalable across multiple product categories.
approach: Defined the brand personality and visual rules.
Developed sub-brand architecture for future expansion.
Created repeatable design guidelines for apparel-ready outputs.
projects.outcome: A foundation ready to scale from designs to a structured brand ecosystem with consistent identity and product direction.

projects.name: MT Mug Coffee
projects.subtitle: Borough-inspired lifestyle coffee brand.
projects.problem: Create a visually attractive, easy-to-use brand experience that feels local, ritual-driven and built for growth.
approach: Positioned the brand around borough identity and daily ritual.
Planned web UX improvements emphasizing clarity, trust and conversion.
execution: Visual motifs for packaging and lifestyle imagery
projects.outcome: A clear blueprint for a high-conversion, brand-forward coffee site experience with scalable visual structure.

projects.name: Bobby Black NYC
projects.subtitle: Order intake and menu update workflows built for speed.
projects.problem: Enable simple order submissions and rapid menu updates without heavy tooling.
approach: Created an update process for menu changes with clear diffs.
projects.outcome: A lightweight operational approach that keeps ordering and updates fast, simple and scalable.

projects.name: Staten News
projects.subtitle: Newsletter brand spanning tech, finance, and sports.
projects.problem: Build a consistent editorial identity with repeatable weekly formats and strong brand voice.
approach: Defined recurring series structures and publishing rhythm.
Built content grouping approach for repeatability across categories.
Created a brand persona to keep the tone memorable.
projects.outcome: A repeatable media system that supports consistent output and strengthens the brand as a trusted voice over time.
